tuv.seg: Alice came to Ireland from the Philippines with her husband who is employed on a Critical Skills Employment Permit
Tháinig Alice go hÉirinn ó na hOileáin Fhilipíneacha lena fear céile atá fostaithe ar Cead Fostiaíochta Scileanna Criticiúla. Cárta
She has been looking for work and found a position in a local shop
Bhí sí ag cuardach oibre agus tháinig sí ar phost le siopa áitiúil
The shop owner looked into getting an employment permit for Alice but have told her that it is too expensive for them to organise the employment permit for her
Rinne an fostóir fiosruithe faoi chead fostaíochta a fháil do Alice, ach tá sé ráite acu léi go mbeidh sé ró-chostasach an cead a fháil di
Alice was very disappointed and went to her local Citizens Information Centre to get more information about employment permits and her options
Bhí an-díomá ar Alice agus thug sí cuairt ar an Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil chun breis faisnéise a fháil faoi cheadanna fostaíochta agus na roghanna atá aici
In fact, because Alice’s husband is already working in Ireland on a Critical Skills Employment Permit, Alice is eligible for a Dependant/Partner/Spousal (DPS) Employment Permit

Is é fírinne an scéil ná toisc go bhfuil fear céile Alice cheana féin ag obair in Éirinn ar Chead Fostiaíochta Scileanna Criticiúla, tá Alice incháilithe do Cead Fostaíochta do Chleithiúnaí/Pháirtnéir/Chéile (CPC)
There is no fee for this permit and the employer does not have to advertise the role to see if an Irish or EEA citizen is available
Ní ghearrtar aon táille as an gcead seo agus ní chaithfidh an fostóir an ról seo a fhógairt le feiceáil an bhfuil saoránach Éireannach nó LEE ar fáil
Alice told her potential employer this and they have applied for and received a DPS Employment Permit for Alice
Dúirt Alice an méid seo lena fostóirí féideartha agus tá iarratas déanta acu, agus Cead Fostaíochta CPC faighte acu do Alice
Now that Alice is working, employment protection legislation applies to her in the same way that it applies to all other workers in Ireland
De bhrí go bhfuil Alice ag obair anois, baineann reachtaíocht cosanta fostaíochta léi ar an mbealach céanna le gach oibrí eile in Éirinn
